New Records: Oklahoma City Thunder sets a new franchise record with 15 straight wins
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scores 33 points and 11 rebounds
The Thunder holds Boston to a season-low 27 points in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The previous team record was set by the then-Seattle SuperSonics in 1996
Others: Jayson Tatum had 26 points and 10 rebounds for the Celtics
Jaylen Brown scored 21 points but went scoreless in the second half
